Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.
